Title: 5 Googley Ways to Celebrate Poetry Month (e300)
Description:
Eric Curts gives us five Googley ways to celebrate Poetry Month. From blackout poetry to rhymefinding extensions, learn about some tools you can use all year long in your language arts classes.

Show Notes: www.coolcatteacher.com/e300
